thread.title: BRIEF-Shawcor Announces Flexpipe Capacity Expansion In Middle East

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shawcor Announces Flexpipe Capacity Expansion In Middle East

organizations.name: flexpipe capacity expansion in middle east shawcor ltd

text:
May 2, 2018 / 3:23 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Shawcor Announces Flexpipe Capacity Expansion In Middle East Reuters Staff
* SHAWCOR ANNOUNCES FLEXPIPE CAPACITY EXPANSION IN MIDDLE EAST
* SHAWCOR LTD - TOTAL VALUE OF JOINT VENTURE’S INVESTMENT IS EXPECTED TO EXCEED USD$20 MILLION
* SHAWCOR LTD - FIRST SHIPMENTS FROM NEW MANUFACTURING FACILITY ARE EXPECTED BY END OF 2019
* SHAWCOR LTD - CO’S DIVISION ENTERED INTO MAJORITY OWNERSHIP JOINT VENTURE WITH LOCAL PIPE INSTALLATION COMPANY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
